definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Forged module, "H"type section, two fist-end type, drum braking.
sentences.chinese: 鍛壓成型，工字形斷面，兩端拳式，鼓式制動器。

sentences.english: The hoisting machine can work normally, the brake should be reliable.
sentences.chinese: 提升捲揚機應能正常工作，制動器應工作可靠。

sentences.english: Pull on parking brake after parking.
sentences.chinese: 停車後要拉上駐車制動器。

sentences.english: I put on the brake before the car knocked into the fire engine.
sentences.chinese: 我踏下了制動器纔沒有撞到救火車上。

sentences.english: On front wheels with disc brake mounts the disc side will have more tension.
sentences.chinese: 與盤式制動器前輪支架，光盤方將有更多的緊張。

sentences.english: From falls screw jack's thread non-self-locking action, is loaded with the brake.
sentences.chinese: 自降螺旋千斤頂的螺紋無自鎖作用，裝有制動器。

sentences.english: The drum brake is the primary safety assembly.
sentences.chinese: 鼓式制動器是汽車上的主要安全部件。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic clutch and brake for the B-class insulation, the normal temperature rise of 40 ℃.
sentences.chinese: 電磁離合器及制動器爲B級絕緣，正常溫升40℃。

sentences.english: DEPENDABILITY. Dual self-adjusting drum brakes, larger drums.
sentences.chinese: 寬大的可自我調節鼓式制動器。

sentences.english: All planetary winches incorporate a spring applied-hydraulic brake.
sentences.chinese: 所有的行星絞盤都有一個彈簧應用液壓制動器。

sentences.english: They were also lighter and better braked, by means of all-round disc brakes .
sentences.chinese: 他們也更輕便，剎車，通過全面盤式制動器的手段。

sentences.english: Introduces the design and specification of disk and drum clutches and brakes.
sentences.chinese: 介紹盤式和鼓式離合器以及制動器的設計和技術說明。

sentences.english: A detent is one notch of the mouse wheel.
sentences.chinese: 制動器是鼠標輪的一個凹口。

sentences.english: Determination of the structure and relative parameters of flake friction braker are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了片式摩擦制動器的結構及有關參數的確定。

sentences.english: Brembo has supplied the colour-coded brakes that are fitted.
sentences.chinese: 倫博已經提供了彩色編碼制動器是安裝。

sentences.english: It will be the first of this segment to being equipped with series with 4 disc brakes .
sentences.chinese: 它將是這段對用與4檯盤式制動器的系列被裝備。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
to spread litter in a cowshed, pigsty etc
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
